page.title: 18ALL SAINTS CHURCH
page.content: All Saints is a daughter of Slaugham church.All saints is on the Horsham road.It has two pianos and one electric organ.There is a toilet at the back of the church.The main services are on Sunday.There is a stained glass window of a dove above the font and there are seats for about 90 people.There is a tablet placed by the staff and scholars of Buckingham Gate central school who were evacuated here in the second world war.The church was built in the late ninteenth century.It is built of brick and has a tiled roof.The clergy and people of the parish are prayed for in Chichester Cathedral at the Holy Communion service and at Evensong. There are 164 people on the electoral roll.
